summary: DT:  CONSUMER COMPLAINED ABOUT  A WINDSHIELD WIPER PROBLEM.  CONSUMER OWNED  A 1998, CHEVROLET BLAZER AND  WINDSHIELD WIPERS WORKED SPORADICALLY, SOME TIMES THEY WONT WORK FOR DAYS. HAD THIS PROBLEM FOR A FEW YEARS.  TRIED TO GET DEALER TO FIX PROBLEM WHEN IT WAS UNDER WARRANTY.  BUT, DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE  PROBLEM. CONSUMER STATED THAT THERE WAS A RECALL FOR YEAR AND  MODELS BEFORE AND AFTER HIS VEHICLE WAS MANUFACTURED.  BUT FOR SOME REASON HIS VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED.*AK
